Summary: Goldish starlike light with 2 red lights opposite side hovered extremely high altitude left high speed.
divs: sighting detailsapproximately @ 10:48 p.m. saturday dec 27 2008 i witnessed an unusual colored golden\bronze bright light (with two opposite red lights each side that turned on shortly after) which seemed like a star or planet. having never seen such in the night sky before i continued to observe it. i was standing facing south\south east compass bearing 170 degrees (taken later for report) and looking directly upward. this bright light was near what looked like another bright star or planet as i am not a well versed astronomer so i can't describe by names. i���m sure there is available star\planet charts for date and time if made available to me i could then point out where it was that i saw this. as i looked up at this unusual colored star it appeared to be a very large type star or planet. the light was pulsating. it then also appeared to get slightly bigger and move from side to side about in an inch square. it was then the two red small lights came on one each side. this went on for a few minutes when all of a sudden this light took off south\south east compass bearing 170 degrees at an extremely high rate of speed. no sound nor noise was heard or seen. at approximately the two o���clock position a smaller particle of the same bright light was ejected\departed the main light and they both soon disappeared into the horizon. how i felt... not sure... weird, stunned, amazed... i'm a retired paramedic\fireman with both military and civilian background. as a trained observer over the years i notice many things others don't. i had gone out to get a breath of fresh air and is customary i look upwards and stargaze. as i was testing out a new flashlight i only wish i had looked up a few minutes earlier to have seen more. you may contact me if you wish but i'd like my name and contact info private. you can use my observation also. sincerely,
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Yucaipa
There were no other sightings in Yucaipa on or around December 27th 2008
